resources: The Beast Of The Labyrinth Pause Game Settings DarkMode #collected / #whole_number Time: Back How to move: Just tap on the cell next to you. What you need to win: Beware of the monster! You can escape from exit point at any time you want, just click on it two times. But for gaining coins you get more score! Check it out in the scoreboard.
